title: 中译英基础练习 1
content: [{"id":"cte1","chinesePhrase":"你好","englishTranslation":"hello","hint":"常见的问候语"},{"id":"cte2","chinesePhrase":"谢谢","englishTranslation":"thank you","hint":"表示感谢"},{"id":"cte3","chinesePhrase":"早上好","englishTranslation":"good morning","hint":"早晨的问候"},{"id":"cte4","chinesePhrase":"晚安","englishTranslation":"good night","hint":"睡前的祝福"},{"id":"cte5","chinesePhrase":"对不起","englishTranslation":"sorry","hint":"表示道歉"}]
